text: Tomadera madhye yara bisbasa sthapana kare o satkarma kare, allaha taderake oyada diyechena ye, taderake abasya'i prthibite sasanakartrtba dana karabena. Yemana tini sasanakatrê¦£2468;ba dana karechena tadera purbabatiderake ebam tini abasya'i sudrrha karabena tadera dharmake, ya tini tadera jan'ye pachanda karechena ebam tadera bhaya-bhitira paribarte abasya'i taderake santi dana karabena. Tara amara ebadata karabe ebam amara sathe ka'uke sarika karabe na. Erapara yara akrtajna habe, tara'i abadhya.
